item.title: Accepted Student Celebrations – Undergraduate Admissions
item.description: The Office of Undergraduate Admissions will host two Accepted Student Celebrations this spring - Saturday, March 21 and Saturday, April 11. We look forward to celebrating with admitted students and their families and highlighting how an RPI education will prepare them to change the world. If you or a campus organization you are part of would like to volunteer during the event, please contact Arianna Livshits, Senior Event Planner, at paluma3@rpi.edu.

item.title: PREMIERE: The Ghost Will Take Us by the Hand performance at EMPAC
item.description: Friday / February 20, 2026 at 8:00 pm An EMPAC commission that blends performance, video, and sound, Korakrit Arunanondchai’s THE GHOST WILL TAKE US BY THE HAND takes cues from Asian horror films, using atmosphere—sonic, choreographic, visual, spiritual—as a primary medium. This ticketed performance disorients spectatorship and tests the boundaries between film and live action. Performance Korakrit Arunanondchai

item.title: Faculty Spotlight on Research & Impact webinar series-Esen Yel
item.description: Date: Wednesday, February 11, 2026 2:00 PM - 2:30 PM - Robots that we can trust What happens when a robot encounters the unexpected? From vacuum cleaners to self-driving cars, autonomous robots promise to take everyday chores off our hands and give us back time and energy. As robots become more common in human-centered environments, they must operate safely amid uncertainty and change. How can we ensure they do not create dangerous situations when new conditions arise? Prof. Yel will discuss…

item.title: Regeneron seeking nominees for Annual Prize for Creative Innovation
item.description: Regeneron seeks to award creativity and innovation in the biomedical sciences with an unrestricted check for $50,000 and an invitation to present a project at Regeneron’s headquarters. Up to 10 finalists will receive a $5,000 award. Rensselaer will select 2 PhD students and 2 post-docs from any discipline for nomination. Contact this office (madige@rpi.edu) for full details and instructions to submit for the internal selection process. Applications will be due to OGE by February 15th.
